description: Not sure why, but when you do nova-manage --help and get a flags listing, ec2_listen_port and osapi_listen_port do not show up. I can grep the code and find them both but didn't see them in the --help listing.
title: The flags ec2_listen_port and osapi_listen_port don't show up in --help output

comments.content: Not sure why, but when you do nova-manage --help and get a flags listing, ec2_listen_port and osapi_listen_port do not show up. I can grep the code and find them both but didn't see them in the --help listing.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~annegentle

comments.content:
Hey Anne,

# nova-api --help | grep listen_port
  --ec2_listen_port: port for ec2 api to listen
  --osapi_listen_port: port for os api to listen

These are available to nova-api, since that is where they are used.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jshepher

comments.content: Got it, thanks for solving the mystery.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~annegentle
